description: Retrieves information for the specified mobile SDK release, including release notes and tags. The mobile SDK is not generally available. Customers who have access to the mobile SDK can use it to establish and manage WAF tokens for use in HTTP(S) requests from a mobile device to WAF. For more information, see WAF client application integration in the WAF Developer Guide.

parameters.name: ReleaseVersion
parameters.description: The release version. For the latest available version, specify LATEST.

nested_items.name: MobileSdkRelease
nested_items.description: Information for a specified SDK release, including release notes and tags.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Tags that are associated with the release.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: Part of the key:value pair that defines a tag. You can use a tag key to describe a category of information, such as 'customer.' Tag keys are case-sensitive.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Part of the key:value pair that defines a tag. You can use a tag value to describe a specific value within a category, such as 'companyA' or 'companyB.' Tag values are case-sensitive.
